title: Will Safecracker Evelynn and other Cops and Robbers skins ever go on sale ?
body:
Just a little curious because it has been 283 days and virtually all the skins that were going to go on sale on October for 375 have gone on sale more recently than Safecracker {{champion:28}} 

Are they blackmailed or what ?

EDIT: I reckon they are gonna release some more skins with this theme :D
EDIT: Answer in one of the replies below >.<

replies.body: Since it still hasn't been a year yet, I'd say in November or December.

May I point out it hasn't been a year since virtually all of the 750 skins going on sale in October went on sale o.o

It's been more than a year since Chrome Rammus and Temple Jax went on sale too and they aren't listed in the October sales so maybe they have a different way of picking skins that go on sale.

I get my data from here https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0Arh3w_1KfCECdEl3UUUyZ0pFSFBWcmpaTDVfa1lBUGc#gid=0 incase you were wondering.

> [{quoted}](name=Jencarna,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YpH7tz4j,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-09-26T09:12:45.469+0000)
>
> May I point out it hasn't been a year since virtually all of the 750 skins going on sale in October went on sale o.o
> 
> It's been more than a year since Chrome Rammus and Temple Jax went on sale too and they aren't listed in the October sales so maybe they have a different way of picking skins that go on sale.
> 
> I get my data from here https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0Arh3w_1KfCECdEl3UUUyZ0pFSFBWcmpaTDVfa1lBUGc#gid=0 incase you were wondering.

Safecracker Evelynn will take a year to go on sale since it has never been on sale before. All the 750RP skins I see on sale for October are all old skins, so it doesn't matter when they go on sale.
They may be waiting for an event. This happened with the pool party skins, which all went on sale during the pool party event.
A cops and robbers event sounds amazing.. or something along the lines of that!
